pr_title: [GEOS-9527] Remove recommendation of OracleJDK from docs and readme files

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9527] Remove recommendation of OracleJDK

Make consistent recomendation of OpenJDK (Linux distribution, OpenJDK, AdoptOpenJDK)

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>

[GEOS-9527] Remove recommendation of OracleJDK

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>
